panels.description:
top $limit по сумме $column за заданный период времени
total_exec_time - общее время выполнения (cpu_time + io_time)
calls - количество выполнений
avg_latency - total_exec_time / calls
buffers_read - сколько данных в сумме поднял запрос из OS (page cache + disc)

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 3000)) AS query,
    SUM(total_exec_time) as total_exec_time,
    sum(calls) as calls,
    total_exec_time/calls as avg_latency,
    8192* SUM(shared_blks_read + temp_blks_read + local_blks_read) AS buffers_read
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    AND query IN (
    SELECT concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 3000))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND('$query' = '-' OR '$query' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '$query') > 0)
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum($column) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY query
targets.query:
SELECT
    concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 3000)) AS query,
    SUM(total_exec_time) as total_exec_time,
    sum(calls) as calls,
    total_exec_time/calls as avg_latency,
    8192* SUM(shared_blks_read + temp_blks_read + local_blks_read) AS buffers_read
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    AND query IN (
    SELECT concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 3000))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND('$query' = '-' OR '$query' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '$query') > 0)
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum($column) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY query
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 3000)) AS query,
    SUM(total_exec_time) as total_exec_time,
    sum(calls) as calls,
    total_exec_time/calls as avg_latency,
    8192* SUM(shared_blks_read + temp_blks_read + local_blks_read) AS buffers_read
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate(1648020665)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1648024265)))
    AND((created_at >= 1648020665) AND(created_at <= 1648024265))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1648020665))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1648024265))
    AND hostname = 'undefined'
    AND ('yes' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    AND query IN (
    SELECT concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 3000))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate(1648020665)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1648024265)))
        AND((created_at >= 1648020665) AND(created_at <= 1648024265))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1648020665))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1648024265))
        AND('' = '-' OR '' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '') > 0)
        AND hostname = 'undefined'
        AND ('yes' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum(total_exec_time) DESC
    LIMIT 5)
GROUP BY query

panels.title: Plan of top $limit query by $column

panels.description:
https://www.postgresql.org/docs/10/pgstatstatements.html
Total time spent in the statement, in milliseconds
per 30 seconds

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(total_exec_time) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND('$query' = '-' OR '$query' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '$query') > 0)
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum($column) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

    LIMIT 5)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

panels.title: calls

panels.description:
https://www.postgresql.org/docs/10/pgstatstatements.html
Total time spent in the statement, in milliseconds
per 30 seconds
не учитывает время планирования запроса

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,

panels.title: latency

panels.description:
https://www.postgresql.org/docs/10/pgstatstatements.html
Total time spent in the statement, in milliseconds
per 30 seconds

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(shared_blks_hit / (shared_blks_hit + shared_blks_read)) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND('$query' = '-' OR '$query' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '$query') > 0)
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum($column) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

panels.title: cache hit ratio

panels.description:
https://www.postgresql.org/docs/10/pgstatstatements.html
Total time spent in the statement, in milliseconds
per 30 seconds
Total number of shared blocks read by the statement * 8192 (block size)

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(shared_blks_read * 8192) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND('$query' = '-' OR '$query' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '$query') > 0)
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum($column) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND('$query' = '-' OR '$query' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '$query') > 0)
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum($column) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=pg_top_queries, user=1 */
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(shared_blks_read * 8192) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate(1743271096)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1743274696)))
    AND((created_at >= 1743271096) AND(created_at <= 1743274696))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1743271096))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1743274696))
    AND hostname = 'LIGHTNING'
    AND ('no' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate(1743271096)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1743274696)))
        AND((created_at >= 1743271096) AND(created_at <= 1743274696))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1743271096))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1743274696))
        AND('' = '-' OR '' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '') > 0)
        AND hostname = 'LIGHTNING'
        AND ('no' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum(total_exec_time) DESC
    LIMIT 5)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

panels.title: shared_blks_read

panels.description:
https://www.postgresql.org/docs/10/pgstatstatements.html
Total time spent in the statement, in milliseconds
per 30 seconds
Total number of temp blocks read and written by the statement * 8192 (block size)

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg((temp_blks_read + temp_blks_written) * 8192) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND('$query' = '-' OR '$query' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '$query') > 0)
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum($column) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

panels.title: temp files read and written

panels.description:
https://www.postgresql.org/docs/10/pgstatstatements.html
Total time spent in the statement, in milliseconds
per 30 seconds
Total time the statement spent writing/reading blocks, in milliseconds (if track_io_timing is enabled, otherwise zero)

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(blk_read_time + blk_write_time) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, '::', datname, '::', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND('$query' = '-' OR '$query' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '$query') > 0)
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND ('$hide_superuser' = 'no' OR username NOT IN ('postgres','monitor'))
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum($column) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

panels.title: IO time

list.definition: select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where created_hour >=  toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by datname order by datname
list.label: Database
list.name: datname
list.query: select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where created_hour >=  toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by datname order by datname

list.definition: select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where datname IN ('$datname') and created_hour >=  toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by hostname order by hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where datname IN ('$datname') and created_hour >=  toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by hostname order by hostname
